wolf noun
(MAN)
[ C usually singular ] old-fashioned disapproving a man who often tries to have sex with the women he meets: He had the reputation of being a bit of a wolf. Idioms
keep the wolf from the door
a wolf in sheep's clothing
to eat a large amount of food very quickly: The boys wolfed the sandwiches (down) and then started on the cake.
